name: Tiramisu
imgAlt: Classic Italian tiramisu dessert in a glass dish
instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar over double boiler until thick.
Remove from heat and whisk in mascarpone until smooth.
Whip heavy cream to stiff peaks and fold into mascarpone mixture.
Mix espresso with coffee liqueur in a shallow dish.
Quickly dip ladyfingers in espresso mixture and layer in dish.
Spread half the mascarpone cream over ladyfingers.
Repeat with another layer of dipped ladyfingers and cream.
Refrigerate for 4 hours, dust with cocoa powder before serving.
